dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bcoll.dunning.DunningCaseRule
dataStructure.description:
The DunningCaseRule represents an action performed by the company (or on its behalf) to recover a debt.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DunningCaseRule

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: iD

child.name: outbreakDate
child.description:
The outbreakDate represents the date at which the condition of the DunningRule has been verified, triggering the outbreak of the DunningCaseRule.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: outbreakDate
